title: Example not included in US GDP in 2018

content.question: Which of the following would NOT be included in the gross domestic product of the United States in 2018?

choices.label: The value of computers produced in the United States in 2018 but not sold
The value of cars produced in the United States in 2018 by a Japanese motor company
The value of cars produced in Japan in 2018 by a United States motor company
The amount a patient paid to a dentist for dental services completed in 2018 in the United States
The value of a restaurant meal purchased by a Japanese tourist in 2018 in the United States

content.answer: The value of cars produced in Japan in 2018 by a United States motor company

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
